item.title: CVE-2024-2209|2024-03-26T23:49:12.512Z -- HP, Inc. -- HP Printer Firmware Update Utility
item.description: A user with administrative privileges can create a compromised dll file of the same name as the original dll within the HP printerâ€™s Firmware Update Utility (FUU) bundle and place it in the Microsoft Windows default downloads directory which can lead to potential arbitrary code execution.
